00016 #include <Kernel/UserDispatcher.hpp>

00021 class SharedTimer : public Timer, public UserDispatcher {
00022     typedef Timer Base;
00023 
00024     public:
00026         SharedTimer();
00028         SharedTimer(UINT32 timeout, BOOLEAN autotimer = FALSE);
00030         virtual ~SharedTimer();
00031 
00033         void Init(UINT32 timeout, BOOLEAN autotimer = FALSE);
00034 
00036         void Start();
00038         void Stop();
00040         void Resume();
00042         void Restart();
00043         
00044     protected:
00046         virtual BOOLEAN OnMessage(const Message& msg);
00047 
00048     private:
00049         enum MsgArg {
00050             TimerStart,
00051             TimerStop,
00052             TimerResume,
00053             TimerRestart
00054         };
00055 };
00056 
00057 template <class T> class SharedTriggerTimer : public SharedTimer {
00058     typedef SharedTimer Base;
00059 
00060     public:
00061         SharedTriggerTimer();
00062         SharedTriggerTimer(T* t, UINT32 timeout, BOOLEAN autotimer = FALSE);
00063         virtual ~SharedTriggerTimer();
00064 
00065         void Init(T* t, UINT32 timeout, BOOLEAN autotimer = FALSE);
00066 
00067     protected:
00068         virtual void OnTimer();
00069 
00070     private:
00071         T   *m_t;
00072 };
00073 
00074 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075     TriggerTimer
00076     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00077 template <class T>
00078 SharedTriggerTimer<T>::SharedTriggerTimer() : 
00079     m_t(0) 
00080 {
00081 }   // TriggerTimer
00082 
00083 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084     TriggerTimer
00085     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00086 template <class T>
00087 SharedTriggerTimer<T>::SharedTriggerTimer(T* t, UINT32 timeout, BOOLEAN autotimer) :
00088     Base(timeout, autotimer), 
00089     m_t(t) 
00090 {
00091 }   // TriggerTimer
00092 
00093 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094     ~TriggerTimer
00095     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00096 template <class T>
00097 SharedTriggerTimer<T>::~SharedTriggerTimer()
00098 {
00099     m_t = 0;
00100 }   // ~TriggerTimer
00101 
00102 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00103     Init
00104     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00105 template <class T>
00106 void SharedTriggerTimer<T>::Init(T* t, UINT32 timeout, BOOLEAN autotimer) 
00107 {
00108     Base::Init(timeout, autotimer);
00109     m_t = t;
00110 }   // Init
00111 
00112 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00113     OnTimer
00114     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00115 template <class T>
00116 void SharedTriggerTimer<T>::OnTimer()
00117 {
00118     ASSERT_DEBUG(m_t != 0);
00119     m_t->OnTimer();
00120 }   // OnTimer
